message: Let's start with a simple split, Bob. I take $6,000, you take $4,000. It's in your best interest to accept quickly before inflation eats away at your share.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think we can do better. I propose we split it 60/40 in my favor, as the inflation will affect you less.
Bob, the clock is ticking, and every round costs us both.  I'll offer you $4,500. It's more than you'd get in another round, even with the 60/40 split you proposed.
